meanings.definition: Cooked in hot oil or fat.
meanings.sent1: The crispy fried chicken smelled delicious.
meanings.sent2: I love the taste of fried potatoes.
meanings.sent3: The fried fish tried to swim in the hot oil!
meanings.sent4: Her hair looked like fried noodles after being in the sun all day.
meanings.sent5: The fried doughnut was a greasy delight.

meanings.definition: Suffering from extreme nervousness or agitation.
meanings.sent1: She felt fried after the stressful presentation.
meanings.sent2: The fried student couldn't focus on the exam.
meanings.sent3: His brain felt like a fried egg from all the worrying.
meanings.sent4: The fried computer screen flickered uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The fried nerves made her hands shake uncontrollably.
